description:
Female ninja from Iga. She was raised with strict discipline as a ninja to carry out missions with loyalty and in cold blood. For this reason, she lacks human emotions such as sympathizing with others. Her actions place highest priority on the Tokugawa Shogun family and the mission, which leads to many conflicts with http://anidb.net/ch65416 [Keiichirou].
Source: ANN
name: Hattori Kiriko
